sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: tucks the universe under his arm,

sense.def: the universe of space and time (according to HNZ "the (cosmic) eaves and rafters" 高誘 注："宇，屋簷也；宙，棟梁也。")

tls:text.tls:line: Do sun and moon compete for a place to shine?
Rites and laws, weights, measures,
Rites and laws, weights and measures,
What a pity! -
How sad!

seg.line: 莊子與惠子遊於濠梁之上。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 莊子與惠子遊於濠梁之上。
tls:text.tls:line: Chuang Tzu and Hui Tzu were strolling along the dam of the Hao River

sense.def: Standard Name: Gōng Zǐ Fā 公子發 (Floruit between -586-563)Personal Name: Zǐ Guó 子國 Canonical Name: Huì Zǐ 惠子 Unger no. 400

tls:text.tls:srcline: 莊子與惠子遊於濠梁之上。
tls:text.tls:line: Chuang Tzu and Hui Tzu were strolling along the dam of the Hao River

tls:text.tls:srcline: 莊子與惠子遊於濠梁之上。
tls:text.tls:line: Chuang Tzu and Hui Tzu were strolling along the dam of the Hao River
"See how the minnows come out and dart around where they please!

sense.def: to go out in order to V

tls:text.tls:line: "See how the minnows come out and dart around where they please!
"See how the minnows come out and dart around where they please!
"See how the minnows come out and dart around where they please!
That's what fish really enjoy!"
That's what fish really enjoy!"

sense.def: such an (as aforementioned) action, such behaviour

tls:text.tls:line: That's what fish really enjoy!"
"You're not a fish -

sense.def: generally honorific pron: you; plural: you gentlemen

tls:text.tls:line: "You're not a fish -
"You're not a fish -
"You're not a fish -
"You're not a fish -
how do you know what fish enjoy?"

sense.def: N1 is the agent of the action N

tls:text.tls:line: how do you know what fish enjoy?"

sense.def: 老之將至 nominaliser converting a subject-VP predicate sentence into an abstract nominalisation

tls:text.tls:line: how do you know what fish enjoy?"
how do you know what fish enjoy?"
"You're not I,

sense.def: generally honorific pron: you; plural: you gentlemen

tls:text.tls:line: "You're not I,
"You're not I,
so how do you know I don't know what fish enjoy?"

sense.def: how? (idiomatic in 安得 "how can one get to?", 安敢"how would I dare to?"

tls:text.tls:line: so how do you know I don't know what fish enjoy?"

sense.def: understand properly; understand and respect properly; be sure of the workings (of something);

tls:text.tls:line: so how do you know I don't know what fish enjoy?"

sense.def: N1 is the grammatical subject but not agent of N2

tls:text.tls:line: "I'm not you,
so I certainly don't know what you know.
so I certainly don't know what you know.

sense.def: understand properly; understand and respect properly; be sure of the workings (of something);

tls:text.tls:line: On the other hand, you're certainly not a fish -
On the other hand, you're certainly not a fish -
On the other hand, you're certainly not a fish -
On the other hand, you're certainly not a fish -
so that still proves you don't know what fish enjoy!"

sense.def: 老之將至 nominaliser converting a subject-VP predicate sentence into an abstract nominalisation

tls:text.tls:line: so that still proves you don't know what fish enjoy!"

sense.def: understand properly; understand and respect properly; be sure of the workings (of something);

tls:text.tls:line: so that still proves you don't know what fish enjoy!"

sense.def: be safe to maintain, be completely safely established as true

tls:text.tls:line: "Let's go back to your original question, please.

sense.def: may I ask (for myself ) to V> please let me [short and idiomatic for 臣請]

tls:text.tls:line: "Let's go back to your original question, please.
"Let's go back to your original question, please.

sense.def: act in accordance with; be in accordance with; obey (the law)

tls:text.tls:line: "Let's go back to your original question, please.
"Let's go back to your original question, please.

sense.def: what is basic and crucial; the basic and crucial feature; basic features; primary consideration

how I know what fish enjoy -

how I know what fish enjoy -

how I know what fish enjoy -
how I know what fish enjoy -
so you already knew I knew it when you asked the question.
so you already knew I knew it when you asked the question.

sense.def: by this time, already; after; after a while

sense.def: know that S; be sure that S

tls:text.tls:line: I know it by standing here beside the Hao."

sense.def: get to be sure of, ascertain; get wind of; come to know about

tls:text.tls:line: I know it by standing here beside the Hao."
I know it by standing here beside the Hao."

sense.def: on something; on the top of something; in (an elevated place) (e.g. 堂上 (not: on the roof!)

tls:text.tls:line: When King Chao of Ch'u was driven from his state,

sense.def: lose control of; lose the allegiance of (the people etc); come to lose what one used to abstractly have (like knowledge, control etc)

tls:text.tls:line: and followed King Chao into exile.4

sense.def: run away, flee; leave quickly[CHECK YOUR LEX ATTRIB][CA]

tls:text.tls:line: and followed King Chao into exile.4
When King Chao regained control of the state,
When King Chao regained control of the state,

sense.def: [our] state; [his] state, her state, their state, one's state; [the subject's] state

tls:text.tls:line: he set about rewarding his followers,

sense.def: will V; is willing to V; have the intention to

tls:text.tls:line: he set about rewarding his followers,

sense.def: make a reward to (a person); award ritual presents to (someone) in compensation for his services

tls:text.tls:line: he set about rewarding his followers,
he set about rewarding his followers,

sense.def: follow along with a contextually determinate person

tls:text.tls:line: but when it came the turn of the sheep butcher Yueh,
"His Majesty lost control of the state,
"His Majesty lost control of the state,

sense.def: large-scale, great; overall (not partial or small-minded); fundamental; of a higher order

tls:text.tls:line: "His Majesty lost control of the state,

sense.def: come to lose what one used to own (e.g. a city, an arm); lose control of; fail to get right what one ought to get right (timing); MENG: fail to stick to (the Way), stray from, disregard; lose count of (the date); stray from (the right road); lose contact with (a person)

tls:text.tls:line: "His Majesty lost control of the state,

sense.def: the state of a contextually determinate person (many examples need to be moved here)

tls:text.tls:line: "His Majesty lost control of the state,

sense.def: [our] state; [his] state, her state, their state, one's state; [the subject's] state

tls:text.tls:line: and I lost my job as sheep butcher.

sense.def: come to lose what one used to own (e.g. a city, an arm); lose control of; fail to get right what one ought to get right (timing); MENG: fail to stick to (the Way), stray from, disregard; lose count of (the date); stray from (the right road); lose contact with (a person)

tls:text.tls:line: and I lost my job as sheep butcher.

sense.def: the subject's job as a butcher

tls:text.tls:line: Now His Majesty has regained the state,
Now His Majesty has regained the state,
and I have also gotten back my sheep-butchering job.

sense.def: likewise, also (sometimes with omitted antecedent, as in 盜亦有道乎？)

tls:text.tls:line: and I have also gotten back my sheep-butchering job.
and I have also gotten back my sheep-butchering job.

sense.def: the subject's job as a butcher

tls:text.tls:line: So my 'title and stipend' have already been restored to me.

sense.def: I, your servant (not necessarily minister or even official); I your son(!!!)

tls:text.tls:line: So my 'title and stipend' have already been restored to me.

sense.def: NP1 owns, controls or employs NP2 三家之堂

tls:text.tls:line: So my 'title and stipend' have already been restored to me.

sense.def: has been returned to the contextually determinate N2

tls:text.tls:line: So my 'title and stipend' have already been restored to me.

sense.def: currently relevant verbal statement; new situationtensed

tls:text.tls:line: Why should there be any talk of a reward?"

sense.def: what N on earth? i.e. none of the N kind

tls:text.tls:line: Why should there be any talk of a reward?"
Why should there be any talk of a reward?"
Why should there be any talk of a reward?"
"Force him to take it!" ordered the king.

sense.def: force N to do the contextually determinate thing V

tls:text.tls:line: "The fact that His Majesty lost the kingdom

tls:text.tls:line: "The fact that His Majesty lost the kingdom

sense.def: [our] state; [his] state, her state, their state, one's state; [the subject's] state

tls:text.tls:line: was no fault of mine -
was no fault of mine -

sense.def: I, your servant (not necessarily minister or even official); I your son(!!!)

tls:text.tls:line: was no fault of mine -

sense.def: criminal guilt; criminal responsibility; 獄決罪定

tls:text.tls:line: was no fault of mine -

sense.def: N's moral mistake, N's criminal responsibility, N's fault

tls:text.tls:line: therefore I would not venture to accept any punishment for it.
therefore I would not venture to accept any punishment for it.

sense.def: presume; venture, have the audacity to (do something in front of a superior); make bold to; take the liberty of V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: therefore I would not venture to accept any punishment for it.

sense.def: be exposed to a punishment; submit to (being executed), subject oneself to

tls:text.tls:line: therefore I would not venture to accept any punishment for it.

sense.def: "the relevant N, that relevant N, the N in question, the N involved"

tls:text.tls:line: therefore I would not venture to accept any punishment for it.
And the fact that His Majesty has regained the kingdom
And the fact that His Majesty has regained the kingdom

sense.def: [our] state; [his] state, her state, their state, one's state; [the subject's] state

tls:text.tls:line: is no accomplishment of mine -
is no accomplishment of mine -
therefore I would not venture to accept any reward for it."

sense.def: presume; venture, have the audacity to (do something in front of a superior); make bold to; take the liberty of V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: therefore I would not venture to accept any reward for it."

sense.def: presume; venture, have the audacity to (do something in front of a superior); make bold to; take the liberty of V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: therefore I would not venture to accept any reward for it."
therefore I would not venture to accept any reward for it."

sense.def: "the relevant N, that relevant N, the N in question, the N involved"

tls:text.tls:line: therefore I would not venture to accept any reward for it."
therefore I would not venture to accept any reward for it."
"Bring him into my presence!" ordered the king.

sense.def: cause N1 to visit the contextually determinate N2

tls:text.tls:line: "According to the laws of the state of Ch'u,

sense.def: law, legal system, legal rule; law text

tls:text.tls:line: a man must have received weighty awards and accomplished great deeds

sense.def: invariably; (e.g. be knowable) with certainty; reliably, with inevitable reliabilty; (know) for certain; with logical necessity;

tls:text.tls:line: a man must have received weighty awards and accomplished great deeds
a man must have received weighty awards and accomplished great deeds
a man must have received weighty awards and accomplished great deeds
a man must have received weighty awards and accomplished great deeds
a man must have received weighty awards and accomplished great deeds

sense.def: important, substantial; the most important 甚大

tls:text.tls:line: a man must have received weighty awards and accomplished great deeds

sense.def: meritorious political or military achievement, meritorious exploits; contributions; proper ultimate function; effective performance (e.g. in cutting off heads!); intended result; results, success

tls:text.tls:line: a man must have received weighty awards and accomplished great deeds

sense.def: objective effects achieved, achievements, results, work results

tls:text.tls:line: a man must have received weighty awards and accomplished great deeds
before he may be granted an audience with the ruler.
before he may be granted an audience with the ruler.

sense.def: manage to; get to perform an act, get to; have had a chance to

tls:text.tls:line: Now I was not wise enough to save the state,

sense.def: marker of new paragraph introducing a non-narrative new sequence, translatable by "now"

tls:text.tls:line: Now I was not wise enough to save the state,
Now I was not wise enough to save the state,

sense.def: cause to persist> cause to survive, preserve, safeguard

tls:text.tls:line: Now I was not wise enough to save the state,

sense.def: [our] state; [his] state, her state, their state, one's state; [the subject's] state

tls:text.tls:line: nor brave enough to die in combat with the invaders.
nor brave enough to die in combat with the invaders.
nor brave enough to die in combat with the invaders.
nor brave enough to die in combat with the invaders.

sense.def: die at the hands of 未知鹿死誰手 "one does not know yet at whose hands the deer will die"

tls:text.tls:line: nor brave enough to die in combat with the invaders.
When the armies of Wu entered the city of Ying,

sense.def: from Qin times onwards: regular army; overall armed forces (could consist of up to a million men) 一軍

tls:text.tls:line: When the armies of Wu entered the city of Ying,

sense.def: enter and gain possession of (a city) without necessarily permanently occupying it and settling there

tls:text.tls:line: When the armies of Wu entered the city of Ying,

sense.def: of persons: go in, enter; join; enter through; of things: enter (also: 入山) [SEPARATE OFF THE FIGURATIVE USAGES AMONG THE EXAMPLES. CH]

tls:text.tls:line: I was afraid of the dangers ahead
I was afraid of the dangers ahead

sense.def: fear (something non-human without standing in awe of it, like death)

tls:text.tls:line: I was afraid of the dangers ahead

sense.def: na4n: difficult point, difficulty; what is difficult; difficult task; difficulties ahead

tls:text.tls:line: and so I ran away from the invaders.

sense.def: and in that way, and thus, and as a result, and consequently

tls:text.tls:line: and so I ran away from the invaders.

sense.def: try to escape from, try to flee from, run away from

tls:text.tls:line: I did not purposely follow after His Majesty.

sense.def: it is not that S, it is not as if S

tls:text.tls:line: I did not purposely follow after His Majesty.
I did not purposely follow after His Majesty.
I did not purposely follow after His Majesty.
I did not purposely follow after His Majesty.

sense.def: marks a judgmenal non-narrative verbal sentence, often as being basic

and yet his pronouncements on righteousness are lofty indeed!

seg.line: 而使吾君有妄施之名乎！

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而使吾君有妄施之名乎！
tls:text.tls:line: allow my ruler to gain a reputation for irresponsibly handing out such favors?

sense.def: cause N to V, bring it about that N V-s 使之聞之 [NB: the first 之shows that the object of 使 does function as an object and not only as a subject of wén 聞. Thus technically speaking we do not have a sentence after the vt.]

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而使吾君有妄施之名乎！
tls:text.tls:line: allow my ruler to gain a reputation for irresponsibly handing out such favors?

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而使吾君有妄施之名乎！

sense.def: acts of generosity; kinds of generosity; generous support

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而使吾君有妄施之名乎！
tls:text.tls:line: allow my ruler to gain a reputation for irresponsibly handing out such favors?

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而使吾君有妄施之名乎！

sense.def: show generousity to people; give generous handouts to people

tls:text.tls:line: I dare not accept.
I dare not accept.

sense.def: presume; venture, have the audacity to (do something in front of a superior); make bold to; take the liberty of V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: I dare not accept.

sense.def: merit the contextually determinate (favorable) treatment N

tls:text.tls:line: And in the end he refused to accept the position.
